info.title: RESTful API Portal
info.description: A portal of simple RESTFul APIs. This is a work in progress.

get.summary: A RESTFul API to convert lengths.
get.description: Converts the value of the from_unit to the unit defined in to_unit.

parameters.name: to_unit
parameters.description: The length unit being converted to: km (kilometers) or mi (miles)...

parameters.name: from_unit
parameters.description: The length unit being converted from: km (kilometers) or mi (miles)...

parameters.name: from_value
parameters.description: The value of the from_unit being converted from.

200.description: The input length along with the converted result.

400.description: The length to_unit or from_unit is not valid. Or when the to_unit and from_unit are the same.

404.description: The length to_unit unit was not provided.

get.summary: A RESTFul API to convert temperature.
get.description: Converts the value of the from_unit temperature to the unit defined in to_unit.

parameters.name: to_unit
parameters.description: The temperature unit being converted to: degC (Celsius), degF (Fahrenheit) or degK (Kelvin).

parameters.name: from_unit
parameters.description: The temperature unit being converted from: degC (Celsius), degF (Fahrenheit) or degK (Kelvin).

parameters.name: from_value
parameters.description: The value of the from_unit being converted from.

200.description: The input temperature along with the converted result.

400.description: The temperature to_unit or from_unit is not valid. Or when the to_unit and from_unit are the same.

404.description: The temperature to_unit was not provided.

get.summary: A RESTFul API to convert weight.
get.description: Converts the value of the from_unit weight to the unit defined in to_unit.

parameters.name: to_unit
parameters.description: The mass unit being converted to: kg (kilograms), or lb (pounds).

parameters.name: from_unit
parameters.description: The mass unit being converted from: kg (kilograms), or lb (pounds).

parameters.name: from_value
parameters.description: The value of the from_unit weight being converted from.

200.description: The input weight along with the converted result.

400.description: The mass to_unit or from_unit unit is not valid. Or when the to_unit and from_unit are the same.

404.description: The mass to_unit unit was not provided.

get.summary: A RESTFul API to retrieve general information the software

200.description: The software product information consisting of name, version, and author.

get.summary: A RESTFul API to retrieve general information about a sensor.
get.description: Retrieves general information about a sensor.

parameters.name: serial
parameters.description: A valid sensor serial number.  For example, 000006c01f0b

200.description: The sensor information consisting of name, location, address and others.

404.description: The sensor serial is not valid or not found.

get.summary: A RESTFul API to retrieve historical temperature sensor readings.

parameters.name: serial
parameters.description: A valid sensor serial number.  For example, 000006c01f0b

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration (last5Years, last1Year, last6Months, last90Days, last60Days, last30Days, last21Days, last7Days, last3Days, lastDay, last24Hours, last12Hours, last6Hours, lastHour) for the past sensor readings.

404.description: The sensor serial is not valid or not found.

get.summary: A RESTFul API to retrieve an HTTP resource given its URL.
get.description: Retrieves the resource defined by the given URL.

400.description: An invalid URL parameter or an error opening the resource defined by the given URL parameter.
